name: Poshi Toky HD Free
description:
"Poshi Toky is a really exciting game..." (read the full review on pianetatech.it)

Poshi Toky is a nice, pretty animal that lives in Japan. He likes to play with gems, jewels, diamonds, but especially with coloured tiles. He uses his sturdy legs to touch and break the tiles, then shakes his long tail to remove them. He tries to remove as much tiles as possible and he is smart enough to use special weapons to facilitate this task. Unfortunately, he needs to avoid to be overwhelmed by incoming tiles and this is not so easy...

Do you want to help the Poshi Toky? He really needs your support... but beware, once you start playing you may never want to stop!


Some features of the game:
* expressly and exclusively designed for the iPad with use of the finger touch & accelerometer (for shaking) features to control the game;
* two game modes: "Classic" (with levels) and "Survival" (continuous mode). The "Survival" mode is available only in the Full Version. The number of levels for “Classic” mode is unlimited in the Full Version;
* three different difficulty levels;
* 150+ different backgrounds in HD (in the Full Version);
* gameplay that rewards strategy as well as speed;
* special weapons and bonuses to help with the game;
* hall of fame for your best scores;
* playable for everybody and anybody!
* it's fun for all ages!


If you like puzzle game download it now... don't miss it!
